questions.question: What is a potential risk of using free public Wi-Fi?
options: B. It can expose your data to hackers.
C. It is faster than mobile data.
questions.explanation: Free public Wi-Fi can be insecure, allowing hackers to intercept your data.

questions.question: What should you do before connecting to public Wi-Fi?
options: A. Check if it is a secure network.
questions.explanation: Always check if the network is secure before connecting.

questions.question: Which of the following is a safe practice when using public Wi-Fi?
questions.explanation: Using a VPN helps protect your data on public Wi-Fi.

questions.question: What is a man-in-the-middle attack?
options: B. An attack where a hacker intercepts communication.
D. A method to secure Wi-Fi.
questions.explanation: A man-in-the-middle attack occurs when a hacker intercepts communication between two parties.
